heading: Are Rice Noodles gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Rice Noodles and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Rice noodles are generally gluten-free, but there is a risk of cross-contamination during processing or preparation. It's important to ensure that they are not made or cooked in facilities that handle gluten-containing ingredients.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Rice Noodles can vary by recipe, ingredients, and cross-contact controls in the kitchen.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.

faq.question: What should I ask a restaurant?
faq.answer: Ask about shared equipment, sauces, marinades, and whether the kitchen has a dedicated gluten-free prep area.
